== Installation ==
http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2171138

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| reboot in recovery
|-
| wipe
|-
| install base Xoom (Wingray) Image: <nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/IhMgb|cm-10.1-20130228-UNOFFICIAL-wingray.zip]]</nowiki> md5: b1391ff076e67f68f89606c2ae349986
|-
| install the Ubuntu 12.10 Touch Preview, daily build <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-touch-preview/daily-preinstalled/current/quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip|quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip*]]</nowiki>
|-
| reboot
|-
| use ubuntu_chroot to edit /usr/bin/ubuntu-session and set GRID_UNIT_PX=10
|-
| reboot
|}

== Known issues ==
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Font rendering in some places is unreadable.
|-
| Display settings have to be manually tweaked in /usr/bin/ubuntu-session to set GRID_UNIT_PX=10
|-
| Have not tested sound at all
|-
| Camera doesn't seem to work
|-
| Haven't tested GPS
|}

=== Redistributability ===
Yes as far as I can tell.

Binaries packaged with this image can be downloaded from <nowiki>[[https://developers.google.com/android/nexus/drivers#wingray|Binaries for Motorola Xoom (US Wi-Fi)]]</nowiki>
